trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There was one other sighting in Austin on or around May 8th 2013
Summary: saw wedge-shaped translucent object in sky travelling from south to north over SW Austin
divs: Sighting DetailsI was lounging in my hot tub around 10:00 PM, looking up at the night sky as I often do, after an evening run. I noticed movement from the south in the sky, I was facing west in the tub. I looked and quickly saw what at first I thought was a high-power search light tracing along the bottom of the clouds. But almost right away I noticed that there WERE no clouds in the sky at that time. This of course startled and interested me so I sprang up and watched as this thing pass directly overhead, I'm guessing at about 2,000 ft, traveling exactly from the south to the north. Very deliberate motion, no wavering. As I watched it go by I noticed it was very clearly wedge-shaped and translucent-white, like the color of a cloud almost. But again, no clouds. To describe the shape, it was very much shaped like an Army Private 'chevron' arm stripe; angular and crisp. Almost exactly the same angle and width proportions of a chevron stripe in fact. It made no sound that I could hear (I had one low-power hot tub jet on, I couldn't turn it off since the tub was in 'filter mode', dang it). I didn't notice any lights on it, just a very slight glow to the whole shape. I waited and watched for another 10 minutes for a search light to cross the sky, but none did. A few wispy clouds drifted by while I was waiting - if there was a search light it would have lit those up. No video or pics unfortunately.
